name: THYIM
description: THYIM INC is a pioneering company transforming community support through its innovative aggregation platform, the PINS (Persons In Need of Services) & Helpers Mobile & Web Apps. These revolutionary apps facilitate indoor, outdoor, and roadside assistance (i.e. gas delivery, tire changes, trash removal, holiday services, spider removal and more) by connecting everyday people who need help with everyday people who can provide it, all within a 15-minute radius.
one_liner: THYIM INC is a pioneering company transforming community support through its innovative aggregation platform, the PINS (Persons In Need of Services) & Helpers Mobile & Web Apps. industry: Lifestyles of Health and Sustainability and wellness
